work.name: Academia Desde0
work.summary: Desde0 Academy is an innovative platform dedicated to empowering individuals to kickstart their careers in software development. We focus on delivering high-quality, hands-on training in mobile and web development, designed for students of all levels, from beginners to advanced developers. Our curriculum covers modern programming languages, frameworks, and development practices for web, mobile, desktop and server development.
responsibilities: Developed the curriculum for all the courses
